model.filemanagement.encoders

Class RLEEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.filemanagement.encoders.Encoder
      • model.filemanagement.encoders.RLEEncoder

  • public class RLEEncoder
extends Encoder
    This class handles the interpretation of the board and translates it to Run Length Encoding format Three methods that interprets the meta data and one method that parses the byte[][] board

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class model.filemanagement.encoders.Encoder
